Catalog.ResourceDescription.Name: crisma-tabular
Catalog.ResourceDescription.Author: Manuel Warum
Catalog.ResourceDescription.Description: Simple widget to display table data

OutputEndpoint.name: selected_row
OutputEndpoint.label: Selected row
OutputEndpoint.description: Sends a signal whenever a row is clicked
OutputEndpoint.doc:Documentation: If a row was selected by the user with a mouse click, this event will transmit the row's data as a JSON object. The property keys of this object denote the column header, and the property value contains the value (exactly as it is displayed).
